DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind randomized clinical trial carry subject suboptimal control LDL-cholesterolemia , follow Mediterranean diet , treat red yeast rice extract ( contain 10 mg monacolin K per daily dose ) placebo , order evaluate middle-term effect vascular health evaluate non invasive method ( Vicorder ( R ) apparatus )
